title: Raw Republic
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All vegetarian except for tuna salad. A juice bar that also serves salads, parfaits and sweet snacks, in addition to a variety of juices, some of which are vegan or can possibly be made vegan. Ingredients are clearly labelled for every item. Almond milk is available as an alternative.
